column5: Caught my first ever gar today on the ohio river while i was fishing for sauger.    I also lost count of the sauger that I caught.

Great going Matt!!!  Those things are hard to hook with an actual hook and not a frayed piece of nylon... and believe it or not, are edible... but you dang near need a chainsaw to clean one!!!   ... btw... where's the Sauger pics???
Well done! I hope to be able to do the same up here in Ont. That is a nice fish! WTG!
Great job. That's a good size gar.
Great stuff Matt ! Good to see a fishing report from you!
Nice, not a bad size either. I've only caught 2 smaller then that one in my life both with a 1/16th ounce jig and worm fishing walleye on Gbay.
